Target: Astronauts Linda Godwin and Daniel Tani
Polar_expression: floated out of space shuttle Endeavour and grabbed onto the ship 's robot arm for a 50 - foot ride up the side of the space station

text: Astronauts Linda Godwin and Daniel Tani floated out of space shuttle Endeavour and grabbed onto the ship 's robot arm for a 50 - foot ride up the side of the space station .
